trans-unit.source: Specifies that a class provides event or instance instrumentation.
trans-unit.target: 指定類別提供檢測事件或執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Note: the WMI .NET libraries are now considered in final state, and no further development, enhancements, or updates will be available for non-security related issues affecting these libraries.
trans-unit.target: 注意︰ WMI.NET 程式庫目前被認為在最終狀態，而且沒有進一步開發之用，增強功能，或更新可供非安全性相關問題會影響這些程式庫。

trans-unit.source: The [MI APIs](https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/jj152383%28v=vs.80%29.aspx) should be used for all new development.
trans-unit.target: [MI Api](https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/jj152383%28v=vs.80%29.aspx)適用於所有新的開發。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Management.Instrumentation.InstrumentationClassAttribute"></xref> class that is used if this type is derived from another type that has the <xref href="System.Management.Instrumentation.InstrumentationClassAttribute"></xref> attribute, or if this is a top-level instrumentation class (for example, an instance or abstract class without a base class, or an event derived from **__ExtrinsicEvent**).
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Management.Instrumentation.InstrumentationClassAttribute"></xref>類別時所用此類型衍生自另一個類型具有<xref href="System.Management.Instrumentation.InstrumentationClassAttribute"></xref>屬性，或如果這是最上層的檢測類別 (例如，而不需要基底類別或事件的執行個體或抽象類別衍生自**__ExtrinsicEvent**)。

trans-unit.source: ## .NET Framework Security Full trust for the immediate caller.
trans-unit.target: ##.NET framework 安全性 Full 信任立即呼叫者。

trans-unit.source: This member cannot be used by partially trusted code.
trans-unit.target: 這個成員無法供部分信任程式碼。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[從部分信任程式碼使用程式庫](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: The type of instrumentation provided by this class.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別所提供的檢測類型。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Management.Instrumentation.InstrumentationClassAttribute"></xref> class that has schema for an existing base class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Management.Instrumentation.InstrumentationClassAttribute"></xref>具有現有的基底類別的結構描述的類別。

trans-unit.source: The class must contain proper member definitions for the properties of the existing WMI base class.
trans-unit.target: 類別必須包含現有 WMI 類別屬性的基底的適當成員定義。

trans-unit.source: ## .NET Framework Security Full trust for the immediate caller.
trans-unit.target: ##.NET framework 安全性 Full 信任立即呼叫者。

trans-unit.source: This member cannot be used by partially trusted code.
trans-unit.target: 這個成員無法供部分信任程式碼。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[從部分信任程式碼使用程式庫](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: The type of instrumentation provided by this class.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別所提供的檢測類型。

trans-unit.source: The name of the base class.
trans-unit.target: 基底類別的名稱。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the type of instrumentation provided by this class.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定由這個類別所提供的檢測類型。

trans-unit.source: ## Property Value Contains an <xref:System.Management.Instrumentation.InstrumentationType> value that indicates whether this is an instrumented event, instance, or abstract class.
trans-unit.target: ##屬性值包含<xref:System.Management.Instrumentation.InstrumentationType>值，指出這是否已經過檢測的事件、 執行個體或抽象類別。</xref:System.Management.Instrumentation.InstrumentationType>

trans-unit.source: .NET Framework Security Full trust for the immediate caller.
trans-unit.target: .NET framework 安全性 Full 信任立即呼叫者。

trans-unit.source: This member cannot be used by partially trusted code.
trans-unit.target: 這個成員無法供部分信任程式碼。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[從部分信任程式碼使用程式庫](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: Returns an <xref href="System.Management.Instrumentation.InstrumentationType"></xref> enumeration value containing the type of instrumentation provided by this class.
trans-unit.target: 傳回<xref href="System.Management.Instrumentation.InstrumentationType"></xref>包含由這個類別所提供的檢測類型的列舉值。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the base class of this instrumentation class.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定這個檢測類別的基底類別的名稱。

trans-unit.source: ## Property Value If not `null`, this string indicates the WMI base class that this class inherits from in the CIM schema.
trans-unit.target: ##屬性值如果不是`null`，這個字串表示此類別繼承自 CIM 結構描述中的 WMI 基底類別。

trans-unit.source: .NET Framework Security Full trust for the immediate caller.
trans-unit.target: .NET framework 安全性 Full 信任立即呼叫者。

trans-unit.source: This member cannot be used by partially trusted code.
trans-unit.target: 這個成員無法供部分信任程式碼。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[從部分信任程式碼使用程式庫](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: Returns a <xref:System.String> value containing the name of the base class of this instrumentation class.
trans-unit.target: 傳回<xref:System.String>值，包含此檢測類別的基底類別的名稱</xref:System.String>
